text: what's up guys we are settling nicely
into our new home in Bangkok and our
neighborhood is amazing if you've ever
been to this city then you know how
massive and hectic it can be which is
exactly why we have moved to a semi
outer district called on nut our
apartment which we are renting from a
friend cost four hundred and fifty bucks
a month which is 225 each we have a
laundry machine two AC units a nice
fridge a small kitchen superfast Wi-Fi
and a nice bedroom our building has a
pool and a gym included for free it's
literally perfect we are just a
10-minute walk to the nearest BTS
station on Nut where we can get downtown
in five stops around our building we
have two malls and five 7-elevens within
a five-minute walk there's also a tasty
Thai restaurant downstairs as well as a
barbershop and a spa 100 but okay let's
go ever wonder why I always cut my hair
in Southeast Asia and never back home
it's one fifth of price for the same
outcome what do you guys think I think
it's a pretty damn good haircut and I'm
definitely going back there again next
one Street over is completely filled
with massage places and street food
vendors one two three four five six
seven eight and five places plus dozens
of little stalls cutting coconuts giant
durian tasty barbecue and all sorts of
surprises like fresh roses and it's also
cheap hello how are you we even had this
little market here right in the middle
of everything
in fact this street is so cool that it
will be an entire video in itself one of
the nearby malls called habido has a
concept that's built around
entrepreneurship so that building behind
us is our home and that building is work
there's a co-working space called hubba
which we have joined and we've been
grinding out work every day free lunch
is included in our $90 a month
membership the community here is great
and we've already been making good
friends all in all we are very happy to
be slowing down in bangkok for a while
but don't worry I'll still be travelling
in and out of Thailand like to Bhutan in
a few weeks this place is just our new
home base I'm Drew Pinsky and if you
like my travel videos please click
Subscribe and join me as I plan to visit
every country in the world
